insert into tbl_tripboard(tb_seq, fk_userid, tb_name, tb_subject, tb_city, tb_content, tb_pw, tb_readCount, tb_regDate, tb_status, tb_fileName, tb_orgFilename, tb_fileSize) values(tb_seq.nextval, #{fk_userid}, #{tb_name}, #{tb_subject}, #{tb_city}, #{tb_content}, #{tb_pw}, default, default, default, #{tb_fileName}, #{tb_orgFilename}, #{tb_fileSize})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tbl_tripboard where tb_status = 1
and lower(tb_subject) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and lower(tb_content) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and (lower(tb_subject) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%' OR lower(tb_content) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%')
and lower(tb_name) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and lower(tb_city) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'

SELECT tb_seq, fk_userid, tb_name, tb_subject, tb_readCount, tb_regDate, tb_city, tb_fileName FROM ( SELECT rownum AS RNO , tb_seq, fk_userid, tb_name, tb_subject, tb_readCount, tb_regDate, tb_city, tb_fileName FROM ( select tb_seq, fk_userid , substr(tb_name, 1,1) || '*' || substr(tb_name, 4) AS tb_name , tb_subject, tb_readCount, to_char(tb_regDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') AS tb_regDate, tb_city , tb_fileName from tbl_tripboard where tb_status = 1
and lower(tb_city) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and lower(tb_subject) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and lower(tb_content) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and (lower(tb_subject) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%' or lower(tb_content) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%')
and lower(tb_name) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
order by tb_seq desc ) V ) T WHERE RNO between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

SELECT tb_previousseq, tb_previoussubject , tb_seq , fk_userid, tb_city , substr(tb_name, 1,1) || '*' || substr(tb_name, 4) AS tb_name , tb_subject, tb_content, tb_readCount, tb_regDate, tb_pw , tb_nextseq, tb_nextsubject , tb_fileName, tb_orgFilename, tb_fileSize FROM ( select lag(tb_seq, 1) over(order by tb_seq desc) AS tb_previousseq , lag(tb_subject, 1) over(order by tb_seq desc) AS tb_previoussubject , tb_seq , fk_userid, tb_city, tb_name, tb_subject, tb_content, tb_readCount , to_char(tb_regDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') AS tb_regDate, tb_pw , lead(tb_seq, 1) over(order by tb_seq desc) AS tb_nextseq , lead(tb_subject, 1) over(order by tb_seq desc) AS tb_nextsubject , tb_fileName, tb_orgFilename, tb_fileSize from tbl_tripboard where tb_status = 1
and lower(tb_city) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and lower(tb_subject) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and lower(tb_content) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and ( lower(tb_subject) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%' or lower(tb_content) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%' )
and lower(tb_name) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
) V where V.tb_seq = ${tb_seq}
update tbl_tripboard set tb_readCount = tb_readCount + 1 where tb_seq = ${tb_seq}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_tripbd_like where fk_userid = #{userid} and FK_TB_SEQ = #{tb_seq}
